sample-makefile

NAME = readconfig
CC = gcc
CCFLAGS = -Wall -lhdf5
RM = rm -vf

all: demo main

demo:
        $(CC) $(CCFLAGS) -c sample-readconfig.c -o sample-readconfig.o

main:
        $(CC) $(CCFLAGS) -o $(NAME) sample-readconfig.o -lreadconfig 

clean:
        $(RM) $(NAME) *.o *.a
